title: OpenAI researchers warned board of AI breakthrough ahead of CEO ouster, sources say
relevance_explanation: The document is highly relevant as it provides direct information about the circumstances leading to Sam Altman's firing and subsequent events that reflect on the internal dynamics and concerns at OpenAI.
summary: A letter from OpenAI researchers to the board, warning about a potentially threatening AI breakthrough, was a key factor in the firing of CEO Sam Altman. OpenAI declined to comment but internally acknowledged the letter and a project named Q*. There were also concerns over commercializing technological advances without fully understanding their consequences. After Altman's firing, more than 700 employees threatened to quit. The Q* model showed potential in solving basic mathematical problems, indicating significant advances towards artificial general intelligence (AGI). Researchers also warned about the inherent dangers posed by intelligent machines.
